title: Samson Oil & Gas RIU Good Oil Presentation
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Tue, Sep 1, 2015, 01:43 BST - UK Markets open in 6 hrs 17 mins Samson Oil & Gas RIU Good Oil Presentation Press Release : Samson Oil & Gas Limited – 13 minutes ago Related Content 
DENVER & PERTH, Australia--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- 
RIU GOOD OIL CONFERENCE -- Samson Oil & Gas Limited (ASX: SSN; NYSE MKT: SSN) advises that its CEO, Terry Barr, will be presenting to delegates attending “The 2015 RIU Good Oil Conference” being held in Perth, Australia September 2-3, 2015. 
The presentation will be posted on Samson’s website, www.samsonoilandgas.com . 
The presentation is scheduled for Thursday 3 September 2015, Session 4, Day 2 at 3.40pm AWST (AUST) which is equivalent to Thursday 3 September 2015 at 1.40am MDT (USA). 
Samson Oil and Gas Limited will also be hosting Shareholder Briefing’s in Melbourne and Sydney as follows: 205 Collins Street, Melbourne VIC 3000 No. 1 Martin Place, Sydney NSW 2000 
If you wish to attend, please register your interest to Amy Suiter at amy.suiter@samsonoilandgas.com .au . 
About Samson Oil & Gas Limited 
Samson’s Ordinary Shares are traded on the Australian Securities Exchange under the symbol "SSN." Samson's American Depository Shares (ADSs) are traded on the New York Stock Exchange MKT under the symbol "SSN." Each ADS represents 200 fully paid Ordinary Shares of Samson. Samson has a total of 2,837 million ordinary shares issued and outstanding (including 230 million options exercisable at AUD 3.8 cents), which would be the equivalent of 14.185 million ADSs. Accordingly, based on the NYSE MKT closing price of US$0.66 per ADS on Aug 31st, 2015 the Company has a current market capitalization of approximately US$9.5 million (the options have been valued at an exchange rate of 0.7149). Correspondingly, based on the ASX closing price of A$0.004 for ordinary shares and a closing price of A$0.001 for the 2017 options, on Aug 31, 2015, the Company has a current market capitalization of approximately A$11.5 million. For and on behalf of the board of SAMSON OIL & GAS LIMITED
